name: Actuation
description:
What is actualy like to use a gun

every horror game i played it looks like the protagonist even if she is a little girl, comes with a army background. 

i dont know why but that smooth reloading and aiming actions are not easy to do and every game completely goes wrong in this aspect.

i tried to make a prototype to give you a more realstic feel on using a gun.

REMEMBER . Standing Still Makes Everything Easier
